select count(diIdx) from developinfo where 1=1
and
diTech like concat('%',#{arr1},'%')
and diSubject like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')

select * from ( select @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS dno , p.* from developinfo p, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) TMP where 1=1
and
diTech like concat('%',#{arr1},'%')
and diSubject like CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%')
) a where dno between #{start} and #{end} order by dno
